title: Adviser: Next 3 Months Crucial To Preventing Starvation On Vanuatu
teaser: Melissa Block speaks with Christopher Bartlett, who is coordinating food security and agriculture response to Cyclone Pam for Vanuatu. He says the nation needs food aid until it can harvest crops.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
